de.weltraumschaf.minesweeper.model

Class MineField

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.minesweeper.model.MineField

  • public class MineField
extends Object
    Represents a mine field which contains mine and save boxes randomly.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

        Set all fields in boxes with an instance.

      • setInitialized

        void setInitialized(boolean initialized)
        Set the state to initialized.
        Parameters:
        initialized - true if boxes are initialized, else false

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • createRandomBox

        private BaseMineFieldBox createRandomBox(int rowId,
                               int columnId)
        Create randomly a mine or save box. In average a quarter of created boxes is a mine.
        Parameters:
        rowId - must not be less than 0
        columnId - must not be less than 0
        Returns:
        always new instance

      • getNeighboursOfBox

        List<FieldBox> getNeighboursOfBox(int rowId,
                                int columnId)
        Get the neighbors of a box. 
         +-----+-------+-----+
 | 3,3 |  4,3  | 5,3 |
 +-----+-------+-----+
 | 3,4 | [4,4] | 5,4 |
 +-----+-------+-----+
 | 3,5 |  4,5  | 5,5 |
 +-----+-------+-----+
        Throws IllegalStateException if initializeFieldWithBoxes() never called before.
        Parameters:
        rowId - must not be less than 0
        columnId - must not be less than 0
        Returns:
        never null, maybe empty list

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Get width.
        Returns:
        never less than 1

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Get height.
        Returns:
        never less than 1

      • getBox

        public FieldBox getBox(int x,
              int y)
        Get the field box a given position. Throws IllegalStateException if initializeFieldWithBoxes() never called before.
        Parameters:
        x - must not be less than 0 and greater than getWidth() - 1.
        y - must not be less than 0 and greater than getHeight() - 1.
        Returns:
        never null

      • setBox

        void setBox(int x,
          int y,
          FieldBox box)
        Set the field box a given position.
        Parameters:
        x - must not be less than 0 and greater than getWidth() - 1.
        y - must not be less than 0 and greater than getHeight() - 1.
        box - must not be null

      • setGameOver

        public void setGameOver()
        Set the game as lost if a mine was opened.

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Whether the game was lost.
        Returns:
        true if a mine was opened, else false

      • hasWon

        public boolean hasWon()
        Whether the game was won.
        Returns:
        true if all fields are opened or flagged and no mine was opened, else false

      • getBoxes

        public Matrix<FieldBox> getBoxes()
        Get the boxes.
        Returns:
        never null

      • allBoxesOpenOrFlagged

        boolean allBoxesOpenOrFlagged()
        Determines if all boxes of the field are opened or flagged.
        Returns:
        true if all boxes are opened/flagged, else false

      • allBoxesOpenOrFlagged

        static boolean allBoxesOpenOrFlagged(List<FieldBox> list)
        Determines if all boxes are opened or flagged.
        Parameters:
        list - must not be null
        Returns:
        true if all boxes are opened/flagged, else false
